item.title: Google+ Next Step
item.description:
G+ hit the headlines last month with some #badnews.
As a result, people began to think about next step(s).
I am planning to start testing the alternatives in 2019.
Here’s a quick preview of my brand new social profile.
item.dc:creator: DACBARBOS

item.title: Website facelift
item.description:
I had to do something about the look of this website and since I had a long weekend ahead, here it is.
I am very pleased with the new appearance which definitely suits my taste of simplicity.
With this ocasion I also updated my local pelican instance in virtualenv. Altogether …
item.dc:creator: DACBARBOS

item.title: Google+ Reactivated
item.description:
New year, new hopes. Happy New Year, btw.
I silently reactivated my G+ profile in December.
Most probably I will start using it some time soon.
item.dc:creator: DACBARBOS

item.title: Google+ Deleted
item.description:
Today I deleted my Google+ profile including all associated data.
This action has an immediate impact on my twitter re-shared articles.
All related G+: goo.gl links will be broken, returning a 404 error page.
I apologize for any inconvenience that may cause you. Had to be done.
item.dc:creator: DACBARBOS

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
Welcome to DACBARBOS.info
Return anytime for fresh news.
This is a kick-start article.
